Blog

I blog semi-regularly about stuff. My blog entries typically focus on some professional development stuff for an intended audience of undergraduate or graduate students in my discipline. Topics vary, but most focus on political science or parlor tricks in R or R Markdown that I think are worth sharing with the general public. To date, categories on my blog (and number of blog posts in that category) include Github (2), Jekyll (3), LaTeX (1), Linux (1), Political Science (18), R (17), R Markdown (9), RuPaul’s Drag Race (1), Site News (1), and Teaching (10). A full listing of my blog posts follows.
